B

balance - Variable in class Core.Nodes.BinaryNode
Balance factor of the node (used in self-balancing trees like AVL).
BinaryNode - Class in Core.Nodes
Represents a node in a binary tree structure.
BinaryNode(int) - Constructor for class Core.Nodes.BinaryNode
Creates a binary node with no children.
BinaryNode(int, BinaryNode, BinaryNode) - Constructor for class Core.Nodes.BinaryNode
Creates a binary node with specified left and right children.
BinarySearchTree - Class in Core.Tree
Represents a Binary Search Tree (BST), a specialized type of BinaryTree where each node follows the ordering property: All nodes in the left subtree contain values smaller than the parent.
BinarySearchTree() - Constructor for class Core.Tree.BinarySearchTree
Creates an empty Binary Search Tree.
BinarySearchTree(BinaryNode) - Constructor for class Core.Tree.BinarySearchTree
Creates a Binary Search Tree with the specified root.
BinaryTree - Class in Core.Tree
Represents a general binary tree with utility methods for traversals, search, structural verification, and various operations.
BinaryTree() - Constructor for class Core.Tree.BinaryTree
Creates an empty binary tree.
BinaryTree(BinaryNode) - Constructor for class Core.Tree.BinaryTree
Creates a binary tree with the specified root node.
BNode - Class in Core.Nodes
Represents a node of a B-Tree structure.
BNode(int, boolean) - Constructor for class Core.Nodes.BNode
Creates a new B-Tree node.
BTree - Class in Core.Tree
Implementation of a B-Tree data structure.
BTree(int) - Constructor for class Core.Tree.BTree
Creates a new empty B-Tree of order P.
